headline: Tastepoint by IFF Predicts Ten Flavor Trends for 2026
summary: PHILADELPHIA, February 02, 2026--Tastepoint by IFF (NYSE: IFF), a leader in innovative flavor creations and taste solutions, has identified ten flavors expected to shape the North American food and beverage landscape in 2026. These predictions spotlight flavors anticipated to trend in retail, food service and beyond throughout the coming year.
